participant_abstract.sent: The first part of the meeting was dedicated to prototype presentations by the Industrial Designer and the User Interface Designer.
These were later evaluated by all group members according to those criteria that the Marketing Expert considered most relevant and significant according to market trends and user needs.

A discussion on which prototype was the most appropriate to suit the needs followed, and a further discussion took place on the usefulness of the technology provided to the workers and the overall success of the project.
Questions were raised by the Project Manager regarding the financial success and teamwork success within the project.

participant_actions.sent: Only filling in other questionnaires hopefully!.
Project Manager has to fill in the report.

participant_decisions.sent: A Broccoli-style remote was decided to mostly fit in with the requirements.
The shape was user-friendly and practical.
Decisions were democratic and the team worked well together.

participant_problems.sent: Project Manager was not very decisive and his presentation was often not on the screen which meant that not all participants could see exactly what was going on.
The meeting was a bit "wishy-washy" at times.
